price: "Allah bãbu abin bautãwa fãce shĩ Ubangijin* Al'arshi, mai girma."
arabic: ٱللَّهُ لَآ إِلَٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ رَبُّ ٱلۡعَرۡشِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ۩
footnotes: * Ya siffanta Allah da cewa bãbu abin bautãwa fãce Shi, dõmin ya kõre cancantar rãnã ga ibãda, da Ubangijin Al'arshi dõmin ya ɗebe girman gadon Bilkisu daga zukãta.

version.title: Hausa language - Abu Bakr Jomy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Hausa by Abu Bakr Mahmoud Jomy. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: al-lahu lā ilāha illā huwa rabbu al-ʿarshi al-ʿaẓīmi
